title: An Eye for an Eye
description: Blaine Richards, a man on a mission... Out for revenge. His wrath aimed at the one woman who he had fallen in love with. Chantelle Falks, finds herself at the mercy of a mad man. She is trapped, tortured and abused for the crimes of her brother... Blaine seeks his revenge and is willing to do whatever necessary to make Chantelle fill the void that was left when her brother murdered his entire family. With nowhere to go, Chantelle is forced to endure Blaine's abuse... Nothing was going to prepare the both of them for what was to come.ORDER OF BOOKSBittersweetAn Eye For and EyeThe Darkness WithinWARNING: This book is recommended for mature readers over the age of 18. It contains sex and submission and violence.
author: E.L. Beth
